name: ssb-cli
description: Friendly command-line interface for Secure Scuttlebutt.
author: Christian Bundy <christianbundy@fraction.io>

scripts.test: standard && dependency-check ./package.json --unused --no-dev --ignore-module highlight.js --ignore-module @fraction/base16-css && cspell --no-summary '**/*.{js,md}' && tsc --allowJs --resolveJsonModule --lib dom --checkJs --noEmit --skipLibCheck index.js test.js && node test.js
